news_header: Two killed in small plane crash in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
news_original_title: Brazil: 2 dead after light plane crashes in Sao Paulo
news_text: A small plane, a Beech F90 King Air, crashed in Sao Paulo, Brazil, killing the pilot and copilot. The crash occurred on Marques de Sao Vicente Avenue, where the plane also struck a bus. A woman on the bus was hospitalized with injuries, and a motorcyclist was injured by debris from the crash. Four others sustained minor injuries. Sao Paulo Governor Tarcisio de Freitas praised the fire department for their quick response in extinguishing the flames.
